name: Revenge: Chase & Shoot
description:
[Revenge: Chase & Shoot]
- Ready to be the guardian and godfather of Cali City?
- Destroy the Mafia network of the Golden Tooth organization, take over the order, win the reputation and glory!

[Easy and simple to operate]
- Left hand aiming, right hand shooting, the simple operation allows you to quickly master gorgeous shooting skills;
- No need to control the steering of vehicles, just adjust the distance from the enemy's vehicle according to the type of your weapon, causing higher damage. You can complete the operation by moving back and forth with only two buttons!

[Exciting battle experience and ultimate audio-visual enjoyment]
- Creative vehicles chasing & shooting gameplay, stunning visual effects and styled missions. Global real-time PVP, servers all over the world, enjoy a smooth 1 on 1 instant shooting game;
- 5 chapters and 75 different levels, 5 unique battle scenes, a variety of enemies and bosses, will make you addicted to this game!

[Colorful guns, vehicles, and characters]
- Dozens of weapons, different skills, and different optimal attacking distances to help you form your own unique combat strategy;
- A variety of character and vehicle appearances let you stand out from the others!

[Both single player and multiplayer mode]
- If you like exciting stories and the joy of single-player battle, then the story mode and patrol mode will bring you more fun.
- If you like to compete with other players, then the multiplayer competition will let you enjoy the pure ranking experience. Improve yourself, get a higher ranking among players all over the world!

---------------------------------

[Subscription Terms]
Here are the subscription periods available in our game:
Weekly subscription for $3.49 after a 3-day free trial
The offer unlocks the following features:
- Gold, EXP, League Coin Obtained Increase +10%
- Stamina Recharge Speed Increase +10%
- Damage in Singleplay Increase +10%
* Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD

[Canceling a trial or a subscription]
The subscription is renewed automatically unless you turn it off 24 hours before the end of the current period. If you want to cancel a subscription during its free trial, you have to cancel it through your account in the Store. This must be done at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period to avoid being charged. For more information, please visit https://support.apple.com/HT207865 .
